title: Buying RP
body:
Hey guys just a question.
How will I be able to buy RP for other servers if im in Australia?
I wanna buy some rp cards for my eune accounts, but the rp cards here doesnt work on other servers. So is there any other ways to  get it?

replies.body: RP Cards are specific to each region.  Grabbing an EU RP Card would only work on EU servers, as an example.  You'll want to grab an RP Card for your region, or select another method.  Hope that helps!
